::Hot Rod::

ShockWave's missile hit Hot Rod in the chest. He was blasted back, and
had heavy damage. He opened a comm to Cleder.
"I cant stay in the battle. I've taken heavy damage and need to go for
repairs. Also the IGL is starting soon."
Hot Rod transformed to car mode, and drove towards shore.
